name: Selenium
Relationship: Antidotes: IGN.; PULS.Incompatible: CHINA; WINE.Compare: AGNUS; CALAD.; SULPHUR; TELLUR.; PHOS. ACID.

Head: Hair falls out
Scalp feels tense
Headache from tea drinking
PAIN OVER LEFT EYE; WORSE, WALKING IN SUN, STRONG ODORS AND TEA
Stomach: After eating, pulsation all over, especially abdomen
Desire for brandy and other strong drink
Abdomen: Sensation in the tip of urethra as if a biting drop were forcing its way out
Chronic liver affections; liver painful, ENLARGED, WITH FINE RASH OVER LIVER REGION
Stool constipated, hard and accumulated in rectum
Sleep: SLEEP PREVENTED BY PULSATION IN ALL VESSELS, worse abdomen
Sleepless until midnight, awakens early and always same hour
Skin: Itching about finger-joints and between fingers; in palms
Hair falls out from brows, beard, and genitals
Seborrhoea oleos; comedones WITH AN OILY SURFACE OF THE SKIN; alopecia
ITCHING ABOUT THE ANKLES and folds of skin, between fingers
Dry, scaly eruption in palms, with itching
Throat: Cough in morning, with expectoration of bloody mucus
Hawking and raising transparent lumps of mucus every morning
Extremities: Paralytic pains in small of back in the morning
Tearing pain in hands, at night
Male: LOSS OF SEXUAL POWER, with lascivious fancies

details: Marked effects on the genitourinary organs, and often indicated in elderly men, especially for prostration and sexual atony. GREAT DEBILITY; worse, heat. Easy exhaustion, mental and physical, in old age. Debility after exhausting diseases.Selenium is a constant constituent of bones and teeth.
dosage: Sixth to thirtieth potency. Colloidal Selenium injection for inoperable cancer. Pain, sleeplessness, ulceration and discharge are markedly diminished.
